thread.title: State volleyball tournaments begin for Faulkner teams
thread.title_full: State volleyball tournaments begin for Faulkner teams

author: David McCollum
title: State volleyball tournaments begin for Faulkner teams
text:
State volleyball tournaments begin for Faulkner teams Posted: October 24, 2015 - 12:26pm 
LOG CABIN STAFF WRITER 
Four Faulkner County teams will begin state volleyball tournament play at three sites Tuesday. 
Conway will host the 7A tournament at Buzz Bolding Arena. The Lady Cats, the 7A/6A Central champions, will play the Har-Ber Central winner at noon Wednesday in the quarterfinals. 
Semifinals will be at 1 p.m. and 3 p.m. Thursday. The championship game is scheduled for 3 p.m. Friday. 
Greenbrier and Vilonia both qualified for the 5A tournament at Valley View. Greenbrier will play Beebe at 4 p.m. Tuesday. 
The winner takes on Magnolia or Batesville at 4 p.m. Wednesday. Vilonia will play Pulaski Academy at 2 p.m. Tuesday. The winner plays either Lakeside or Nettleton at 2 p.m. Wednesday. 
In the Class 3A tournament at Piggott, Conway Christian will play Jessieville at 6 p.m. tuesday. The winner plays Hoxie or West Fork on Wednesday.
